sentences.en: Catherine demonstrated the proper way to cleanse the face.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳演示了洁面的正确方法。

sentences.en: Cleanse your face thoroughly and pin back your hair.
sentences.cn: 把脸彻底洗干净，再把头发往后别起。

sentences.en: Cleanse your hands, you sinners and purify your hearts, you double - minded.
sentences.cn: 有罪的人哪,要洁净你们的手; 心怀 二意 的人哪,要清洁你们的心.

sentences.en: Establish long term mechanisms to cleanse and curb indecent information.
sentences.cn: 建立清理整治低俗信息的长效机制.

sentences.en: Fresh fruit juices also cleanse your body and reduce dark circles.
sentences.cn: 另外,新鲜果汁,清洁身体,对黑眼圈同样有抑制作用.

sentences.en: Good Books Cleanse the heart and broaden our horizons.
sentences.cn: 真正的好书,可以我们的净化心灵,开阔我们的视野.

sentences.en: Health experts are trying to cleanse the air in cities.
sentences.cn: 卫生专家们正设法净化城市里的空气.

sentences.en: NIV Wash away all my iniquity and cleanse me from my sin.
sentences.cn: 2[和合]求你将我的罪孽4洗除净尽,并洁除我的罪.

sentences.en: One can flush the liver with a liver cleanse.
sentences.cn: 你可以用肝脏净化剂来冲刷肝脏.

sentences.en: Remove catheter for 30 minutes every 24 hours to cleanse and inspect skin.
sentences.cn: 、每24小时除去导管30分钟,以冲洗和检查皮肤.

sentences.en: She used several different creams and lotions to cleanse her face.
sentences.cn: 她使用过几种不同的乳膏和乳液来清洁她的脸部.

sentences.en: Straight after your last cigarette your body will begin to cleanse itself of tobacco toxins.
sentences.cn: 一旦停止抽烟，人体立刻就会开始清除体内的烟草毒素。

sentences.en: The water is cleansed and reused.
To cleanse or treat by means of a douche.
sentences.cn: 冲洗治疗法使用冲洗液冲洗或治疗.

sentences.en: Use a piece of gauze to cleanse the cut.
Wash me thoroughly from my iniquity And cleanse me from my sin.
sentences.cn: 诗51:2求你将我的罪孽洗除净尽、并洁除我的罪.

sentences.en: Wash me throughly from mine iniquity, and cleanse me from my sin.
sentences.cn: 2求你将我的罪孽洗除净尽并洁除我的罪.

words.tran_cn: [化工] 清洁剂；清洁工；干洗店；干洗商；洗洁器
